question: I am married know & no longer working .Can my husband pay zakaat on my behalf
answer:
QUESTION
Before i was married i used to work.i own jewellery and money in foreign currency which i ittend to use for haj.
ANSWER


Share:
If the jewellery and the cash is equivalent or more than the minimum Zakaatable amount, then the Zakaat is due on you upon the completion of one year and every subsequent year. Your husband may discharge the Zakat due on you with your consent.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
